newsitem.title: USA: U.S. debt futures finish lower after quiet session.
newsitem.headline: U.S. debt futures finish lower after quiet session.

text.p: April 8 - U.S. debt futures ended lower after a quiet session spent mostly in negative territory. U.S. adjusted retail sales up 0.2 pct in March, Redbook said. U.S. sold $8.0 bln indexed 9-3/4-year notes at 3.650 pct, awarding 46 pct of bids at high. Traders call auction disappointing, say market continues to consolidate before Friday's data.
